PrivacyPage.title: Privacy at Qrydex
PrivacyPage.noTrackingText: Qrydex is a business search engine built on trust. We do not believe in monitoring our users. When you search with us, we do not log your IP address, we do not store your search history linked to you personally, and we do not sell any behavioral data to third parties.
PrivacyPage.noCookiesText: We use no functional cookies or marketing cookies.
PrivacyPage.publicDataText: The information we display about companies is based solely on publicly available data from registries and open websites.

Common.verifiedAgainstRegistries: All businesses verified against official registries

SearchPage.noResultsQuery: Found no verified businesses or news for "{query}"
SearchPage.searchPrompt: Start by searching for a company

Tools.title: Tools
Tools.whatIsIpText: An IP address (Internet Protocol address) is a unique numerical label assigned to each device connected to a computer network that uses the Internet Protocol for communication. It serves two main functions: host or network interface identification and location addressing.
Tools.whyCheckIpText: Checking your public IP address helps you verify your network configuration, ensure your VPN is working correctly, or troubleshoot connectivity issues. Qrydex provides this free tool to help businesses maintain secure and reliable connections.
Tools.seoKeywords: IP lookup, check my IP, what is my IP, IP location, ISP check, public IP address, geo IP
Tools.bwSeoText1: Easily calculate data transfer times, convert storage units, and estimate website hosting bandwidth requirements. Whether you're a network engineer planning infrastructure or a gamer checking download times, this tool covers all your bandwidth calculation needs.
Tools.bwSeoText2: Find out exactly how long it takes to upload or download files based on your internet speed. Simply enter the file size (e.g., 50GB) and your connection speed (e.g., 100 Mbit/s) to get an instant result.
Tools.bwSeoText3: Planning a new website? Use our hosting estimator to determine how much monthly bandwidth you need based on daily page views and average page size. Avoid overpaying for hosting or hitting data caps.
Tools.bwSeoKeywordsLong: file transfer time calculator, download time calculator, upload speed calculator, gb to mbps converter, website bandwidth estimator, hosting data usage calculator, internet speed requirement, how long to download 100gb, calculate server bandwidth

Tools.relatedBusinessesSubtitle: Verified providers with high trust score
Tools.relatedBandwidthDesc: Need to estimate download times or hosting bandwidth? Use our free Bandwidth Calculator.
Tools.relatedIpCalcDesc: Planning a network or need a subnet mask? Use our precise IP Subnet Calculator.
Tools.redundancyHelp: Factor for bot traffic, backups, etc. (Default: 1.2)
Tools.seoTitle1: What is an IP Subnet Calculator?
Tools.seoText1: An IP Subnet Calculator is an essential tool for network engineers, IT professionals, and students to plan and manage IP networks. It allows you to calculate the range of IP addresses, subnet masks, network addresses, and broadcast addresses for a given IP network segment. By dividing a large network into smaller, manageable sub-networks (subnets), you can improve performance and security.
Tools.seoText2: CIDR (Classless Inter-Domain Routing) is a method for allocating IP addresses and IP routing. It replaces the older classful network design (Class A, B, C). A CIDR notation looks like '192.168.1.0/24', where '/24' represents the number of bits in the network prefix. The subnet calculator converts this into a dotted-decimal mask (e.g., 255.255.255.0) and determines the number of usable hosts.
Tools.seoText3: Subnetting reduces network traffic by breaking down the broadcast domain. It enhances security by allowing administrators to isolate network segments. Furthermore, it helps in the efficient utilization of IP address space, which is critical given the scarcity of IPv4 addresses. Our tool simplifies these complex calculations, making network planning instantaneous.
Tools.seoKeywordsLong: online subnet calculator, ipv4 network calculator, cidr to netmask, calculate usable ip addresses, network masking tool, free ip calc, subnetting tutorial

DnsLookup.title: DNS Lookup Tool
DnsLookup.subtitle: Check DNS records instantly for any domain
DnsLookup.whatIsDnsText: Attributes like A, MX, and CNAME records are essential parts of the Domain Name System (DNS). This tool performs queries against authoritative nameservers to fetch the real-time configuration of any domain.
DnsLookup.recordA: Maps a domain to an IPv4 address.
DnsLookup.recordMX: Specifies mail servers for email delivery.
DnsLookup.recordNS: Shows the Authoritative Nameservers for the domain.
DnsLookup.seoTitle: Free DNS Lookup Tool | Check A, MX, TXT Records - Qrydex
DnsLookup.seoDescription: Instant DNS lookup tool. Check and verify A, AAAA, MX, TXT, NS, CNAME and SOA records for any domain name. Free and fast.
DnsLookup.privacyText: Unlike many domain registrars, Qrydex does NOT track your searches. You can safely check if a domain is active without worrying about front-running or your data being sold. If no records are found, the domain might be available.
DnsLookup.whyText: Use this tool to verify if a domain is pointing to the correct server (A record), if email is set up correctly (MX records), or simply to see if a domain name you want is already taken (Active/Inactive check).
